credentialDetail.textinformation: S'ha emès una nova credencial Dome per a vostè amb la següent informació

credentialOffer.textinformation: You have a new credential offer. Please follow the next steps:
credentialOffer.second-step: 2. Click the button below to get the QR code.
credentialOffer.third-step: 3. Scan the QR code with the
credentialOffer.fourth-step: 4. Enter the pin that you'll receive in your email.

scaner.textinformation: Escaneig de l'organització amb la seva cartera per descarregar la credencial

error.not_found: The requested resource was not found.
error.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
error.forbidden: You do not have permission to access this resource.
error.internal_server: An error occurred on the server. Please try again later.
error.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
